title: Add option to bind Connections and Config panel together
author: igor2x
body_snippet: Testing with mRemoteNG v1.78.2-NB-3224. Bellow is one small "annoyance" I constantly get into and it would be nice to have some improvements like feature request. 1. I like to have Connections and Config tabs at left side collapsed to have as much of the screen available for my sessions. Like this: 2. When clicking on Connections tab to see or change some setting...

comments.author: Kvarkas
comments.snippet: this is working, however not ideal, due a library what we are using to interact with a panels its not allow autohide to panels, so as work arround I apply is additional seting in options, once bind is enabled - auto hide (pin) will work a bit differently - panels will be autohide, but if user click to any of them - both will be shown and pined, but on click outside of them - they will regain auto hide status and hide.

comments.author: Kvarkas
comments.snippet: p.s. option show still has a bug - its not load them properly for some reason, will try to solve this tommorow, in case if its hangs, need to restart mR

comments.author: igor2x
comments.snippet: Tested in mRemoteNG v1.78.2-NB-3224 and I can't see this working, there are still both panels (Connection and Config) bond together if both are manually pinned and both manually unpinned when I would like to collapse/hide them. I am reopening the issue. If there is this somehow implemented, I am more then happy to get some explanation.
